education.name: Business Administration with major in Finance
education.description: The Bachelor's degree in Finance at Lund University covers economics, business administration, statistics, and business law. The program includes group work and various examination formats. Students choose specializations such as Entrepreneurship, Financing, Leadership and Change Management, Marketing, or Business and Data Analytics. The final term includes a comprehensive program examination to review and apply the knowledge gained.

education.name: Portuguese Letters
education.description: The Bachelor's degree in Portuguese Literature at Högskolan Dalarna provides training in the Portuguese language and its diverse literary traditions. The coursework includes studies on contemporary Brazilian and Portuguese literature, African literature in Portuguese, and their societal impacts. Students develop skills in phonetics, grammar, and both written and oral communication. The program covers theoretical aspects of language in society, linguistic variation, and explores transcultural perspectives in contemporary literature. It focuses on literary analysis, research methodologies, and scientific specialization, ending with a comprehensive thesis project.

education.name: App Developer: Android and iPhone
education.description:
The program for iPhone and Android programmers covers comprehensive training in developing mobile applications using Swift and Java/Kotlin. The curriculum covers programming, debugging, configuration of development tools, and documentation processes. Students learn about factors affecting programming quality, methods for internationalization, automation tools for IoT, and various programming languages and tools for IoT.
Some months into the course I was accepted to CapGemini's trainee program, so I made my course internship as employee at CapGemini.
